page.title: 11THE SCHOOL
page.content: The Primary School, which is set in The Glebe,Pencaitland,was not always the school in use. The school that was in use before the one at The Glebe,is now a recording studio.The two schools are not far away from each other. The headmaster is called Mr.Marshall.There are six class teachers in the school. The Primary 1 class teacher is Mrs.Raymond,Primary 2/3 is Mrs.Smith,Primary 3/4 is Mrs.Connelly,Primary 4/5 is Miss.Hogg, Primary 5/6 is Mrs.Ritchie and Primary 7 teacher is Mrs.Watson.There are some visiting teachers as well.Miss.Foubister is the music teacher,Mrs.Jeffrey is the P.E.teacher and Mr.Milligan is the art teacher. The boys receive football and cricket in certain terms while the girls receive netball and unihoc.
